segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s so mundane.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be surprised when she finally looks down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a mess, but it’s almost peaceful in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes everything look so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught before they finish the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a snapshot of everyday chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
